attributes.action: Change the law to make forced adoption unlawful
attributes.additional_details: There has been many high family court judges even the president of the family division has said this we need to make this stop as the uk is unusual in Europe to allow the adoption of a child without parents consent do you want to like in a country Which is seen as unusual because I don't if your like me and what justice for family's sign this petition and show the government we are in this together and that we do have a voice and it will be heared
attributes.background: Let's make forced adoption a unlawful offence and make our voices heared there are thousands of innocent parents who have to live with the ultimate life sentence of been made to say goodbye to their children forever so let's make a stand and let's make this a unlawful offence
